name: Creamy Hamburger and "Rice" Skillet
ingredients: 1/2 pound fresh mushrooms, divided (slice half and finely mince half)
1 pound cauliflower, grated, about 1/2 medium, weighed after trimming

instructions.en: Brown ground beef, celery, onion, and sliced mushrooms in a large skillet. Drain fat well.
instructions.sk: Opečte mleté mäso, zeler, cibuľu a nakrájané huby na veľkej panvici. Dobre zlejte tuk.
instructions.ja: 大きなフライパンで挽肉、セロリ、玉ねぎ、スライスしたマッシュルームを炒めて茶色くします。脂をよく切ります。

instructions.en: Add minced mushrooms, grated cauliflower, and broth. Bring to boil, then simmer covered for 5 minutes.
instructions.sk: Pridajte nasekané huby, nastrúhaný karfiol a vývar. Priveďte do varu, potom varte prikryté 5 minút.
instructions.ja: みじん切りのマッシュルーム、すりおろしたカリフラワー、スープを加えます。沸騰させてから蓋をして5分煮込みます。

instructions.en: Uncover, add cream, and boil on high heat until sauce thickens, about 5 minutes, stirring often.
instructions.sk: Odkryte, pridajte smotanu a varte na vysokom ohni, kým sa omáčka nezahustí, asi 5 minút, často miešajte.
instructions.ja: 蓋を取り、クリームを加え、高温で約5分間、ソースが濃くなるまで頻繁に混ぜながら煮込みます。

instructions.en: Season to taste, add parsley. Optionally dust with xanthan gum and stir. Let stand to thicken.
instructions.sk: Ochuťte podľa chuti, pridajte petržlen. Voliteľne posypte xantánovou gumou a zamiešajte. Nechajte postáť, aby zhustlo.
instructions.ja: 味を調え、パセリを加えます。必要に応じてキサンタンガムを振りかけて混ぜます。少し置いて濃くなるまで待ちます。

notes: Makes 6 servings. Cauliflower is used as a low-carb rice substitute.
